title: Esquire Body Text
content:
Hi guys, do you know which font is the one used as body text for this article in Esquire?

Best,

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Captura de pantalla 2014-03-06 a la(s) 09.06.21.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824191917/http:/typophile.com/files/Captura%20de%20pantalla%202014-03-06%20a%20la(s)%2009.06.21.png) | 347.61 KB |
author: uzapucax

comments.content: Might be [T-Star](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824191917/http:/www.binnenland.ch/font/family/T-Star) by Binnenland Michael Mischler.

thanks for the fast reply Ryuk. It looks very much like T-Star as you said.

Best!
